mapper.select: SELECT coupon_history_no, member_no, member_name, client_no, client_name, menu_no,menu_title, coupon_history_quantity, coupon_history_cost, coupon_history_date FROM coupon_history WHERE member_no = #{member_no} AND coupon_history_info = '판매' AND EXTRACT(year FROM coupon_history_date) = #{year} AND EXTRACT(month FROM coupon_history_date) = #{month} ORDER BY coupon_history_date DESC
